Class FlatType

java.lang.Object
FlatType
Direct Known Subclasses:
ThreeRoom, TwoRoom
public abstract class FlatType extends Object
An abstract base class representing flat type. Defines common properties and behaviors for all flat types (2-Room, 3-Room, etc.).

This class maintains information about:

  • Available units of this flat type
  • Price per unit
  • Allowed marital status groups that can apply
  • Flat type name/classification

Concrete flat type classes should extend this base class.

      public FlatType(int units, double price, MaritalStatus allowedGroup)
      Constructs a FlatType with single allowed marital status group.
      Parameters:
      units - the number of available units (must be positive)
      price - the price per unit (must be positive)
      allowedGroup - the marital status allowed to apply

    • FlatType

      public FlatType(int units, double price, ArrayList<MaritalStatus> allowedGroups)
      Constructs a FlatType with multiple allowed marital status groups.
      Parameters:
      units - the number of available units (must be positive)
      price - the price per unit (must be positive)
      allowedGroups - list of permitted marital statuses
